translation.en: [boy in Chinese] I want to become rain, scouring the roof
translation.zh: 我想变成雨 擦洗屋顶

translation.en: I want to become a wave And take away the past
translation.zh: 我想变成浪 带走过往

translation.en: I want to become fire, burn and purify
translation.zh: 我想变成火 灼烧和净化

translation.en: But if I can, I want to be myself
translation.zh: 但如果可以 我更想做我自己

translation.en: [boy in English] I'm about to introduce myself.
translation.zh: 我来自我介绍一下吧

translation.en: My name is Yin Yuguo.
translation.zh: 我叫殷昱国

translation.en: I'm 16 years old.
translation.zh: 今年16岁

translation.en: Born and raised in Kunming, China.
translation.zh: 在中国昆明出生长大

translation.en: I often dream I'm a dragon.
translation.zh: 我经常梦见自己是一条龙

translation.en: I can go anywhere.
translation.zh: 可以去到任何地方

translation.en: See the world.
translation.zh: 游览世界

translation.en: Find my true home.
translation.zh: 寻找我真正的家

translation.en: I really like communicating with people in English.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢用英语跟人交流

translation.en: I enjoy expanding my vocabulary. That's why I write here to you all.
translation.zh: 我热衷于拓宽词汇量 所以我才会在这里写日志

translation.en: I love literature deeply,
translation.zh: 我对文学充满热爱

translation.en: and most books I read are by Central and Eastern European authors.
translation.zh: 我读的书大部分都出自 中欧和东欧作家之手

translation.en: I'm in grade ten in high school,
translation.zh: 我是一名高一的学生

translation.en: and I feel like a dragon flapping its wings in a dark dungeon.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己犹如一条被困在 阴暗地牢里的龙 孤独地扑扇着翅膀

translation.en: I love poetry books, especially Eastern European Romantics.
translation.zh: 我爱读诗集 尤其是东欧的浪漫主义诗歌

translation.en: But most people call those "useless books" because they can't help you with exams.
translation.zh: 但大多数人都认为那些是“没用的书” 因为它们没法帮你通过考试

translation.en: A well-known Polish poetess said,
translation.zh: 一位著名的波兰诗人曾说

translation.en: "I prefer the absurdity of writing poetry to the absurdity of not writing poetry."
translation.zh: “我情愿做个荒谬的写诗人 不愿荒谬地辍笔不耕”

translation.en: Well, I prefer the absurdity of reading poetry.
translation.zh: 好吧 我情愿做个荒谬的读诗人

translation.en: [in Chinese] Forest, why are you so troubled?
translation.zh: 树林里的树木 你为何摇摆呻吟

translation.en: There's no wind and there's no rain
translation.zh: 既没有和风吹过 也没有细雨飘落

translation.en: Yet your branches are in pain
translation.zh: 你的枝条又为何局促不安

translation.en: Yes, I'm troubled, you know why?
translation.zh: 我本来不愿摇摆

translation.en: Because the summer's almost over
translation.zh: 可是夏天已经过去

translation.en: And my leaves are quickly falling
translation.zh: 数数还有几片树叶在我的枝条上

translation.en: [woman in Chinese] I'd call my son "the carer of the stars,"
translation.zh: 我把我的儿子叫做 “星辰的看护人”

translation.en: like he could only talk to the universe.
translation.zh: 好像他能跟宇宙和星辰对话一样 （画外音 殷昱国的母亲 蔡青）

translation.en: There's no one on earth that could understand him.
translation.zh: 他说他在尘世 没有人能够听懂他的语言

translation.en: He had this special loneliness.
translation.zh: 他有一种特殊的孤独

translation.en: As if he was breathing, but nobody else could hear his existence.
translation.zh: 就像他在呼吸 而别人却听不到这种呼吸的存在

translation.en: My heart ached because the only thing I could do was let him cry in my arms.
translation.zh: 我很心疼他 但我唯一能为他做的事 就是让他在我的怀中哭泣

translation.en: I'd hold him in my arms and pat his back.
translation.zh: 然后静静地搂着他 轻轻地拍着他的背

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] My parents love me so much and understand me,
translation.zh: 我的父母都很爱我 也很理解我

translation.en: but if I can't study abroad, life can't carry on.
translation.zh: 但若不能出国留学 我将枯萎死去 （殷永林 殷昱国的父亲）

translation.en: [in Chinese] I hope for four things.
translation.zh: 首先呢 我期望的是…

translation.en: The first is to be able to continue to enrich myself intellectually.
translation.zh: 我期望四点 第一点是能够继续充实自己

translation.en: The second is to be able to take pleasure
translation.zh: 第二点是能够在紧接着

translation.en: in all kinds of creative endeavors,
translation.zh: 对文学和艺术 以及人类的各种各样的

translation.en: like literature and art.
translation.zh: 富有丰富创造力的创造活动中 继续地愉悦自己

translation.en: The third is to carry out my own creative activities
translation.zh: 第三个呢 是进行自己的创造活动

translation.en: and contribute to the arts and cultures of the world.
translation.zh: 第三个呢 是进行自己的创造活动 为这个社会的无论文化也好 或者其他方面也好做出些贡献

translation.en: And the fourth one is to find true love in a new society.
translation.zh: 第四个呢 是我希望能够 在新的社会中找到真爱

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] Dear Romanian National Ministry of Education,
translation.zh: 亲爱的罗马尼亚国家教育部

translation.en: I'm writing this letter to explain why I dream to study in Romania.
translation.zh: 我谨以此信 阐述我前往罗马尼亚求学的梦想

translation.en: Dear sir or madam of the University of Bacău.
translation.zh: 巴克乌大学尊敬的先生或女士

translation.en: Salutations. I am a Chinese senior high school student,
translation.zh: 您好 我是一名中国的高中生

translation.en: and I am fond of Romanian culture, especially Mihai Eminescu.
translation.zh: 我热爱罗马尼亚文化 尤其喜爱米哈伊埃米内斯库的作品

translation.en: [man in Romanian] Yuguo's email inquiring about the possibility of studying in Romania
translation.zh: 我到办公室时 昱国的那封 询问能否前来罗马尼亚求学的邮件

translation.en: was in my inbox when I arrived at work.
translation.zh: 正静静地躺在我的收件箱里

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] My dream is to come to Romania,
translation.zh: 我的梦想就是去罗马尼亚

translation.en: the country of literature in my heart,
translation.zh: 到我心目中的文学之邦

translation.en: to learn Romanian and become a real literary worker.
translation.zh: 学习罗马尼亚语 成为一名真正的文学工作者

translation.en: [Apăvăloaei in Romanian] Of all the emails I get from young people who want to study in Romania,
translation.zh: 我收到过很多 有意来罗马尼亚求学的年轻人的邮件

translation.en: none say, "I'm in love with Romania."
translation.zh: 只有他说了：“我热爱罗马尼亚”

translation.en: So, I replied immediately,
translation.zh: 所以 我立即就回信了

translation.en: as he was the student I'd always hoped for.
translation.zh: 因为他就是我一直想要的学生

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] I always knew I was a Carpathian dragon.
translation.zh: 我一直都知道 我是一条来自喀尔巴阡的龙

translation.en: Isn't this such a wonderful coincidence
translation.zh: 多么美妙的巧合呀

translation.en: that my university is right at the foot of Carpathian Mountains?
translation.zh: 我的大学正在喀尔巴阡山脉脚下

translation.en: [Qing in Chinese] He was going to be a student in Romania.
translation.zh: 他要成为一名罗马尼亚的学生了

translation.en: How to protect him?
translation.zh: 我们是怎么保护他的？

translation.en: We hadn't given him any constraints.
translation.zh: 我们从来没有给过他任何约束

translation.en: He was going to live freely,
translation.zh: 他一直以来都活得自由而舒展

translation.en: but I still wanted to protect him under the wings of the old hen.
translation.zh: 可是我还是想把他放在我这个 老母亲的翅膀底下 一生护他周全

translation.en: I took a picture of him as we left for the airport.
translation.zh: 当我们出发去机场的时候 我拍了一张他的照片

translation.en: I didn't want to be corny or sentimental,
translation.zh: 我不想让离别太过煽情

translation.en: but I was afraid of missing him too much.
translation.zh: 但是又害怕自己会太过于想念他

translation.en: [Yonglin] Going abroad to Romania to study, this was his wish, which was a good thing.
translation.zh: 去罗马尼亚留学… 那是他的愿望 也是一件好事

translation.en: So even though in my heart I didn't want him to go so far,
translation.zh: 所以即使我心里 不愿意让他去那么远的地方

translation.en: I wasn't going to stop him.
translation.zh: 我也没有阻拦他

translation.en: [Qing] I felt him watching me in the side mirror, looking at me with a smile,
translation.zh: 那时 我似乎能感觉到坐在后座的他 正带着浅浅的笑容看着我

translation.en: but I had to grit my teeth and carefully mask my heartbreak.
translation.zh: 但我却要咬着牙 小心地掩盖住我的心碎和不舍

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] My biggest adventure so far.
translation.zh: 这是我有生以来最伟大的冒险

translation.en: It's time to leave for a new cave
translation.zh: 是时候启程前往新的巢穴了

translation.en: A higher one, wider And with light that is brighter
translation.zh: （《前往新的巢穴》 殷昱国作品） 那里更高、更宽、更明亮

translation.en: On the way, the weather may snow
translation.zh: 途中也许会有霜雪

translation.en: And the winds may heavily blow
translation.zh: 也许狂风肆虐

translation.en: But since what is calling, I know
translation.zh: 但听见命运的呼唤 我知道

translation.en: I must go
translation.zh: 我必须前往

translation.en: [Apăvăloaei in Romanian] I think he was surprised
translation.zh: 我想他刚到巴克乌时

translation.en: to arrive in a town of only 200,000 people like Bacău.
translation.zh: 应该很惊讶吧 这个小镇只有二十万人口 （巴克乌）

translation.en: People don't come here.
translation.zh: 没有人想来这里

translation.en: This is not Bucharest or one of the big cities.
translation.zh: 它不是布加勒斯特或者其他大城市

translation.en: You're either just passing through or something's wrong.
translation.zh: 它不是布加勒斯特或者其他大城市 到这里的人不是路过 就是走错路了

translation.en: [Yuguo in Chinese] Hi, Mother! This is it.
translation.zh: 嗨 老妈 这儿 就这儿了 老瓦西里 亚力克山大大学 在巴克乌这边儿

translation.en: Vasile Alecsandri University in Bacău.
translation.zh: 嗨 老妈 这儿 就这儿了 老瓦西里 亚力克山大大学 在巴克乌这边儿 它被命名为这边儿 最有名的诗人和戏剧作家 （巴克乌大学）

translation.en: Look at the old building.
translation.zh: 看这个古老悠久的学楼

translation.en: This is Eminescu, of course.
translation.zh: 毋庸置疑 这是埃米内斯库

translation.en: This is Mr. Adrian. You know him already. He always helps me.
translation.zh: 这是阿德里安叔 你应该已经知道他了 他经常帮我的

translation.en: This is my class.
translation.zh: 这是我的教室

translation.en: And this is Ms. Drugă. She teaches Romanian grammar.
translation.zh: 这是德鲁加老师 她主教罗马尼亚语法

translation.en: [Yuguo in Chinese] And the amazing Mr. Dănilă.
translation.zh: 这位是最牛的丹尼拉老师

translation.en: [in Romanian] This was my first contact with a Chinese person.
translation.zh: 那是我第一次接触到中国人

translation.en: No foreigners come here just to study Romanian culture and language.
translation.zh: 从没有外国人会专程来 学习罗马尼亚的语言和文化

translation.en: Or at least not in our university.
translation.zh: 至少在我们学校没有

translation.en: I'd heard he was at the university.
translation.zh: 我听说过学校有这号人物

translation.en: And I saw a young man. Tall.
translation.zh: 我看见了一个年轻人 个子很高

translation.en: What always amazed me was the way he dressed.
translation.zh: 最令我感到不可思议的是他的着装

translation.en: Always wearing a white shirt.
translation.zh: 总是穿着白衬衫

translation.en: [Apăvăloaei] Buttoned all the way up.
translation.zh: 扣子全部扣好

translation.en: [Savin] Impeccably ironed.
translation.zh: 衣物熨烫妥帖

translation.en: He would wipe the blackboard, although I was used to doing it myself.
translation.zh: 他总是主动来擦黑板 虽然我已经习惯了自己动手

translation.en: He always offered to carry my laptop.
translation.zh: 他总会提出帮我拿笔记本电脑

translation.en: I'd say, "Don't worry, I can handle it." "No, teacher."
translation.zh: 我说：“不用 我自己能行” 但他仍然坚持

translation.en: I actually asked him,
translation.zh: 其实我问过他

translation.en: I said, "Sorry to ask,
translation.zh: 我说：“冒昧问一句 你的家乡是 有几百万人口的大城市吧？”

translation.en: how many million inhabitants does the city you come from have?"
translation.zh: 你的家乡是 有几百万人口的大城市吧？”

translation.en: And when he said it's five times bigger than Bucharest,
translation.zh: 他说那里的人口是布加勒斯特的五倍

translation.en: I asked, "So why did you come to Bacău? To Romania?"
translation.zh: 我就问他：“那你为什么要来巴克乌 来罗马尼亚呢？”

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] I like the city of Bacău.
translation.zh: 我喜欢巴克乌这座城市 （殷昱国的博客文章）

translation.en: On the weekends,
translation.zh: 周末的时候

translation.en: I enjoy going to sleep right before the sunrise
translation.zh: 我喜欢在日出前入睡

translation.en: and getting up in the mild sunshine of Romanian afternoon.
translation.zh: 在罗马尼亚下午柔和的阳光中起床

translation.en: Wearing a tie,
translation.zh: 系上领带

translation.en: sleepy eyes.
translation.zh: 睡眼惺忪

translation.en: Trying to end the rise of tiredness with a cup of coffee.
translation.zh: 试图用一杯咖啡赶走倦意

translation.en: But I must practice more.
translation.zh: 但我必须更勤加练习

translation.en: [Yuguo in Romanian] What I wish for you, sweet Romania
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚

translation.en: What I wish for you, sweet Romania
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚

translation.en: What I wish for you, sweet Romania
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚

translation.en: Of all Eminescu's poems,
translation.zh: 在埃米内斯库的所有诗歌中

translation.en: he was most attached to that anthem,
translation.zh: 他最爱那首颂歌

translation.en: let's call it that,
translation.zh: 可以这么说吧

translation.en: "What I Wish for You, Sweet Romania."
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚

translation.en: [Yuguo] My country of glory The country I long for
translation.zh: 我的荣耀之国 我渴盼的国度

translation.en: [Savin] He asked me to listen to him recite it.
translation.zh: 他请我听他朗诵那首诗

translation.en: He recited it twice, and then he insisted on hearing me recite.
translation.zh: 他念了两遍 然后还非要听我念

translation.en: [Yuguo] May you have a future As great as your past!
translation.zh: 愿你的未来 如你的历史般光辉灿烂！

translation.en: Sweet Romania, this I wish for you
translation.zh: 亲爱的罗马尼亚 这就是我对你的愿望

translation.en: [woman] We hosted the National Day of Culture at the Alfa Gallery in Bacău,
translation.zh: 我们在巴克乌的阿尔法美术馆 举办国家文化节

translation.en: and that's when Yuguo appeared.
translation.zh: 就在那时 昱国出现了

translation.en: [man] A young Chinese man came down the alley.
translation.zh: 一个中国小伙子沿小巷走来

translation.en: He stopped in front of the gallery and said, "Good day!" in Romanian.
translation.zh: 他在美术馆门前停下 用罗马尼亚语说：“你好！”

translation.en: What was he up to?
translation.zh: 他想干什么？

translation.en: We were amused by him.
translation.zh: 我们都被他逗乐了

translation.en: I captured this, which was very comical.
translation.zh: 我把这有趣的一刻记录了下来

translation.en: With the Astrakhan hat, a traditional Romanian hat.
translation.zh: 他还戴着罗马尼亚的传统服饰 卡拉库尔帽

translation.en: [Băcăoanu] …to celebrate not just our national poet, Mihai Eminescu,
translation.zh: …不光是纪念和庆祝 我们的国民诗人米哈伊埃米内斯库

translation.en: but Romanian culture as a whole.
translation.zh: 还有整个罗马尼亚文化

translation.en: People were quite apathetic. It was a dull event.
translation.zh: 人们基本都在冷眼旁观 那是一个平淡无趣的活动

translation.en: We were there just to show face.
translation.zh: 我们就是去露露脸罢了

translation.en: Halfway through the event…
translation.zh: 活动进行到一半时…

translation.en: Good day!
translation.zh: 大家好！

translation.en: Today, I have Eminescu's
translation.zh: 今天 我要为大家朗诵 埃米内斯库的诗作

translation.en: "What I Wish For You, Sweet Romania."
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚

translation.en: [Băcăoanu] The audience was fascinated.
translation.zh: 观众都听得入迷了

translation.en: The room went quiet.
translation.zh: 整个房间鸦雀无声

translation.en: What is this boy doing here? How come he can speak Romanian?
translation.zh: 这个小伙子是来做什么的？ 他怎么会说罗马尼亚语？

translation.en: You could read the awe on people's faces
translation.zh: 人们的脸上写满了惊奇… （希尔多乔治卡尔坎 作家）

translation.en: because of how well he spoke the language.
translation.zh: …因为他的罗马尼亚语说得非常好

translation.en: What I wish for you, sweet Romania
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚

translation.en: My country of glory The country I long for?
translation.zh: 我的荣耀之国 我渴盼的国度

translation.en: [Ungureanu] Now laugh, if you can.
translation.zh: 想笑就笑吧

translation.en: When we first saw him, we laughed like idiots.
translation.zh: 初次见到他时 我们笑得像一群大傻子

translation.en: But he wowed everyone.
translation.zh: 但他让所有人惊叹

translation.en: Like the night's stars Like the day's dawn
translation.zh: 如黑夜星辰 若白日黎明

translation.en: May you live forever Full of glory and joy
translation.zh: 愿你万岁永年 充满荣耀欢欣

translation.en: [Dănilă] I was watching him, listening to him,
translation.zh: 我看着他 听着他的声音

translation.en: and I was convinced
translation.zh: 打从心里相信

translation.en: I'm in the presence of an extraordinary being.
translation.zh: 站在我面前的是一位超凡脱俗的人物

translation.en: Um, and now, in Chinese.
translation.zh: 现在 我要用中文朗诵了

translation.en: [in Chinese] What I wish for you, sweet Romania…
translation.zh: 我对你有什么愿望呢 亲爱的罗马尼亚…

translation.en: [Bonta in Romanian] That's exactly what the event needed,
translation.zh: 他的到来打破了活动的沉闷

translation.en: a young Chinese man coming out of nowhere to recite Eminescu.
translation.zh: 这名突然出现的中国少年 朗诵着埃米内斯库的诗歌

translation.en: He seemed to fit in.
translation.zh: 他完美地融入了进来

translation.en: He was looking for his place amongst Romanians and in our culture.
translation.zh: 他想在罗马尼亚人和我们的文化中 寻求自己的一席之地

translation.en: But we also needed someone like him! To discover us, the way that Yuguo did.
translation.zh: 但我们也同样需要像他这样的人！ 像昱国那样来发现我们

translation.en: [in Chinese] Sweet Romania, this I wish for you
translation.zh: 亲爱的罗马尼亚 这就是我对你的愿望

translation.en: [in Romanian] Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: [Băcăoanu] He said he was the only son of a family of university teachers.
translation.zh: 他说他是家中独子 父母都是大学老师

translation.en: I thought it was amazing that he was allowed by his family
translation.zh: 我感到很惊讶 他的家人居然会同意

translation.en: to travel so far at such a young age.
translation.zh: 让他小小年纪就远赴异国他乡

translation.en: [Qing in Chinese] Although he was far from us, he was accomplishing his mission.
translation.zh: 虽然他离开我们很远 但是他是在完成他的使命

translation.en: He was so happy to share
translation.zh: 他每天都那么高兴地跟我们分享

translation.en: his daily discoveries and happiness with us.
translation.zh: 他的快乐和新发现

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] If you have the opportunity to observe a crow carefully,
translation.zh: 如果你有机会仔细观察乌鸦

translation.en: you will find that the crow's feathers and posture are extremely beautiful.
translation.zh: 你会发现乌鸦的羽毛和姿态 都极为优美

translation.en: Crows are rarely seen in my hometown.
translation.zh: 乌鸦在我的家乡很少见

translation.en: White, the winter
translation.zh: 雪白 冬日

translation.en: White, the winter
translation.zh: 雪白 冬日 （无名诗 殷昱国作品）

translation.en: Clouds hanging high in the sky
translation.zh: 云层高悬天空

translation.en: Foggy the sight, foggy the sight
translation.zh: 雪花纷飞 视野朦胧

translation.en: Merciless as the dragon's flame
translation.zh: 如巨龙的火焰 无情挥洒

translation.en: [man 1 in Romanian] He hadn't seen snow before.
translation.zh: 他以前从来没见过雪

translation.en: He was very happy.
translation.zh: 他很开心

translation.en: When it snowed late at night, he'd come outside.
translation.zh: 哪怕在深夜下起了雪 他也会走出室外

translation.en: [woman] He wanted to absorb everything!
translation.zh: 他想领略这里的一切！

translation.en: Atmosphere, nature, buildings, trees, birds.
translation.zh: 人文氛围、自然环境 楼房、树木、飞鸟

translation.en: I'm often disappointed…
translation.zh: 我经常对罗马尼亚…

translation.en: by Romania,
translation.zh: 感到失望

translation.en: but he saw it with completely different eyes
translation.zh: 但他却用截然不同的眼光看待这里

translation.en: and showed me that Romania is really beautiful.
translation.zh: 也让我看到了 罗马尼亚真的很美

translation.en: [man 2] He started coming to our museum, and he was more serious than any of us!
translation.zh: 他开始来我们的博物馆参观 而且比我们任何人都认真！

translation.en: We tried to talk to him in English,
translation.zh: 我们尝试用英语跟他交流

translation.en: but he only wanted to hear Romanian. He'd come here to learn our language.
translation.zh: 但他只想听我们说罗马尼亚语 他是来学习我们的语言的

translation.en: He wanted to know everything.
translation.zh: 他对一切都充满了求知欲

translation.en: [Bernevic] He seemed like from a different era.
translation.zh: 他仿佛一个来自不同时代的人

translation.en: He was delicate on the inside.
translation.zh: 他的内心很细腻

translation.en: That's what I felt.
translation.zh: 这就是他给我的感觉

translation.en: That he was…
translation.zh: 感觉他是一个…

translation.en: pure.
translation.zh: 很纯粹的人

translation.en: He was searching for something
translation.zh: 他在如饥似渴地

translation.en: with so much thirst and with so much intensity.
translation.zh: 热烈追寻着某样东西

translation.en: [announcer] Esteemed travelers, train 554 is…
translation.zh: 尊敬的旅客 第554次列车…

translation.en: [Băcăoanu] He really wanted to go to Alba Iulia.
translation.zh: 他一心想去阿尔巴尤利亚

translation.en: The journey to Alba Iulia is hellish.
translation.zh: 去往阿尔巴尤利亚的路途很艰苦

translation.en: I don't know many people in Bacău
translation.zh: 在巴克乌 没有多少人

translation.en: who would just grab a flag and take the train to Alba Iulia
translation.zh: 会在12月1日冒着严寒 就那么拿着一面国旗

translation.en: on the 1st of December when it's so cold.
translation.zh: 坐上开往阿尔巴尤利亚的火车

translation.en: [Yuguo] ♪ Wake up, Romanian ♪
translation.zh: 醒来吧 罗马尼亚人民

translation.en: ♪ From the sleep of death ♪
translation.zh: 自沉睡中苏醒

translation.en: [Qing in Chinese] He called us. He was very excited.
translation.zh: 他给我们打了电话 他说他太激动了

translation.en: He couldn't sleep that night.
translation.zh: 他说他前一晚上激动得睡不着觉

translation.en: He sang the Romanian anthem
translation.zh: 在去阿尔巴尤利亚的整个旅途中

translation.en: all the way to Alba Iulia on the train journey.
translation.zh: 他都在哼唱罗马尼亚国歌

translation.en: He said, "Mom, I'll take part in a big parade."
translation.zh: 他说：“妈妈 我要去参加大游行了

translation.en: "I'll be with everyone, in the middle of the crowd!"
translation.zh: 我会在那儿 我会在游行队伍的最中间！”

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] This year, all of Romania is headed to Alba Iulia
translation.zh: 今年 罗马尼亚各地的人民 纷纷前来阿尔巴尤利亚

translation.en: for the hundredth anniversary of the unification.
translation.zh: 欢庆国家大统一一百周年

translation.en: I was fortunate to participate in and document the celebrations.
translation.zh: 我有幸参与和记录了这一盛事

translation.en: [all chanting in Romanian] Long live great Romania!
translation.zh: 伟大的罗马尼亚万岁！

translation.en: [man] I met Yuguo at Alba Iulia.
translation.zh: 我在阿尔巴尤利亚遇到了昱国

translation.en: He was wearing more Romanian flags than any of us.
translation.zh: 他身上佩戴的罗马尼亚国旗 比我们任何人都多

translation.en: He was so emotional and happy and said, "We're going to celebrate together!"
translation.zh: 他情绪高昂、兴高采烈地说 “我们来一起庆祝吧！”

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] I'm not worried about being lonely anymore.
translation.zh: 我再也不必担心感到孤独了

translation.en: The people here have shown me the greatest warmth.
translation.zh: 这里的人们对我非常热情友好

translation.en: They help me and trust me,
translation.zh: 他们帮助我、相信我

translation.en: even when I haven't done anything practical to their country,
translation.zh: 哪怕我只是在表达对他们祖国的热爱

translation.en: just showing my love to their nation.
translation.zh: 但尚未对其做出任何实际的贡献

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [woman] Why did you come here today?
translation.zh: 你今天为什么来这里？

translation.en: I love Romanian culture and literature.
translation.zh: 我热爱罗马尼亚的文化和文学

translation.en: Today, I'm here to celebrate with everyone.
translation.zh: 今天 我是来跟大家一起庆祝的

translation.en: Happy birthday, Romania.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 罗马尼亚

translation.en: I wish Romania and the Romanian people will have a great future.
translation.zh: 我祝愿罗马尼亚和罗马尼亚人民 拥有辉煌的未来

translation.en: -[woman] Where are you from? -China. Yes.
translation.zh: 你来自哪里？ 中国 是的

translation.en: [in Romanian] For someone to come from such a faraway place
translation.zh: 一个远道而来的外国人

translation.en: and talk so beautifully and simply about you…
translation.zh: 如此简单纯粹地赞美你…

translation.en: I don't know. That never happens.
translation.zh: 我不知道 这种事前所未有

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] People invited me to have traditional Romanian food.
translation.zh: 人们邀请我品尝罗马尼亚的传统美食

translation.en: They all chatted with me and regarded me as a friend.
translation.zh: 他们都来和我聊天 把我当朋友对待

translation.en: I was so happy that night.
translation.zh: 那天晚上 我很开心

translation.en: [Dănilă in Romanian] Here it is. His first published article.
translation.zh: 就是这个 他发表的第一篇文章

translation.en: "1st of December, Alba Iulia" by Yin Yuguo.
translation.zh: 《12月1日 阿尔巴尤利亚》 作者：殷昱国

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] When I'm happy, I like to go to the park.
translation.zh: 开心的时候 我喜欢去公园

translation.en: The sovereignty of the main park in Bacău belongs to the crows.
translation.zh: 巴克乌的主公园是乌鸦的领地

translation.en: The sound of flapping wings is endless.
translation.zh: 扇动翅膀的声音连绵不绝

translation.en: I feel like the dragon finally found his home.
translation.zh: 我感觉巨龙终于找到了自己的家

translation.en: I still have a lot to explore, a lot to see and discover.
translation.zh: 虽然仍有很多东西 等着我去探索、见证和发现

translation.en: But I have a lot of time and all my energy, which is limitless.
translation.zh: 但我有大把的时间和无穷的精力

translation.en: [in Romanian] I met young Yin Yuguo on January 4th, 2019.
translation.zh: 我是在2019年1月4日见到的殷昱国

translation.en: He came to visit the museum,
translation.zh: 他来博物馆参观

translation.en: and at the end of the guided tour,
translation.zh: 导览参观完毕后

translation.en: he wanted to write something in the visitor book.
translation.zh: 他想在访客留言簿上写点什么

translation.en: And because he was so tall, he knelt down.
translation.zh: 但他太高了 于是他跪了下来

translation.en: It was an extraordinary moment.
translation.zh: 那是一个不同寻常的时刻

translation.en: It was like a prayer for the history of the place,
translation.zh: 仿佛他在为这里的悠久历史而祈祷

translation.en: so I asked if I could take a photo.
translation.zh: 所以我问他 能不能让我拍张照片

translation.en: Later on, that photograph, unfortunately,
translation.zh: 不幸的是 后来发生了那样的悲剧

translation.en: became the one by which the police identified him
translation.zh: 而那张照片最终成为了

translation.en: after the tragedy that took place.
translation.zh: 警察确认他身份的依据

translation.en: On Friday night, he told me he wanted to go visit Neamt Fortress.
translation.zh: 周五晚上 他跟我说 他想去参观尼亚姆茨要塞

translation.en: I asked him not to go. There were weather warnings.
translation.zh: 我叫他别去 那里发布了气象警报

translation.en: [Dănilă] But he decided to go. He took the train.
translation.zh: 但他还是决定要去 他登上了火车

translation.en: And in a station along the way,
translation.zh: 在沿途的其中一站

translation.en: the train was stationary for a bit longer than usual.
translation.zh: 火车比往常停留得稍久了一些

translation.en: Without any means of information, Yuguo panicked.
translation.zh: 没有收到任何消息 昱国慌了

translation.en: He thought that's where he was supposed to get off.
translation.zh: 他以为自己到站了

translation.en: He decided to jump as the train was leaving.
translation.zh: 就在火车正要开动时 他决定跳车

translation.en: He opened the door
translation.zh: 他打开门

translation.en: and saw a sea of snow,
translation.zh: 看见一片雪海

translation.en: without knowing that underneath the snow, there was a stone mile marker,
translation.zh: 但他不知道的是 在白雪覆盖下 有一个石制的里程标

translation.en: which he hit his head on.
translation.zh: 他的头撞了上去

translation.en: The end was instantaneous.
translation.zh: 瞬间毙命

translation.en: [Qing] I remember you were playing in the bathtub when you were small.
translation.zh: 我想起你小时候在浴缸里 扑打嬉戏的场景

translation.en: The water splashed everywhere,
translation.zh: 浴室里水花四溅

translation.en: and the whole room was filled with your laughter.
translation.zh: 整个房间都是你的笑声和水声

translation.en: You said, "I think the nature of the universe is ashes."
translation.zh: 你对我说 “我觉得宇宙的本质就是各种尘埃”

translation.en: "The Earth is the ashes of the Sun. The Sun is the ashes of the galaxy."
translation.zh: “地球是太阳系的尘埃 太阳系是银河系的尘埃

translation.en: "Everything is ashes."
translation.zh: 而银河系则是宇宙的尘埃”

translation.en: [Qing] You were five.
translation.zh: 那时你还只有五岁

translation.en: [Yonglin] I lost the ability to smile.
translation.zh: 我都不会笑了

translation.en: If there is indeed a parallel universe,
translation.zh: 如果真的有那样一个平行世界的话

translation.en: I hope he's there, pursuing his dreams.
translation.zh: 我希望他在那里继续追寻他的梦想

translation.en: I hope he's healthy and happy in that world,
translation.zh: 我希望他在那里生活得健康、快乐

translation.en: living the life he wants.
translation.zh: 过着他想过的生活

translation.en: I must learn to be strong.
translation.zh: 而我必须学会坚强

translation.en: [Qing] Many asked us if we regret letting him go.
translation.zh: 很多人都问过我跟他爸爸 有没有后悔送他出去

translation.en: We don't. We don't have regrets.
translation.zh: 我们没有后悔 一点儿都没有

translation.en: The biggest wish parents have
translation.zh: 作为父母 对孩子最大的期望 就是希望能看到

translation.en: is to see their child realize their dreams.
translation.zh: 他们的孩子实现他们自己的梦想

translation.en: If we are afraid to follow our dreams, then we can't have anything.
translation.zh: 如果因为害怕 而不去追逐它 那终将一无所有

translation.en: Bacău is his home.
translation.zh: 他把巴克乌当成了他的家

translation.en: Because it's in the Carpathian Mountains.
translation.zh: 因为它在喀尔巴阡山的脚下

translation.en: Because he spent 80 incredibly happy days there.
translation.zh: 因为他在那里度过了 无比幸福和快乐的80天

translation.en: He said, "Mom, I dreamt I was a dragon, flying in the sky."
translation.zh: 他说：“妈妈 我梦见自己是一条龙 我在天上飞着

translation.en: "But I died. My heart was stabbed."
translation.zh: 但是我的心被刺破了

translation.en: "I fell from the sky, and my flesh was given to many people."
translation.zh: 我从天上掉下来 我的肉被分给了人们”

translation.en: He told me the dream made him happy.
translation.zh: 他说他这个梦让他很高兴
